alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 04 at 3:02AM EST until March 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Strong west winds winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe, Alleghany, and Watauga counties. In Virginia, Grayson County. In West Virginia, western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...Through 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High elevation locations will experience the strongest gusts.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
